gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 121, Nets 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Nets, 121-102. Julius Randle recorded 26 points, seven rebounds, and four assists for the Knicks, with Donte DiVincenzo (23 points, eight rebounds) and Immanuel Quickley (19 points) combining for 42 points in the victory. Cam Thomas tallied 20 points, five assists, and two rebounds for the Nets in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 16-11 in the regular season, while the Nets fall to 13-14.
